title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Russia sends 3 Iranian satellites into orbit, report says
items.description: The report said that a Russian rocket sent the satellites on Sunday from a launchpad in eastern Russia.

items.title: Spaniards hurl flour, eggs and fireworks in mock battle
items.description: The annual food fight festival ''Els Enfarinats'' has left the Spanish town of Ibi covered in flour and egg shells.

items.title: French cinema actress Brigitte Bardot dies aged 91
items.description: The actress was a symbol of sexual liberation in the 1950s but became increasingly controversial after making homophobic and racist slurs.
